attributes.action: Increase Defence spending to 5% of GDP per annum for the next 10 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the public call upon the Prime Minister to increase defence spending to 5% of GDP with immediate effect for the next 10 years.

We call on all political groups to support this action. 

For too long British service men and women have been let down by lack of political support & equipment, financial backing and personal care.

If you feel the need to help these brave people then sign up to help them, for they are not allowed to speak out.

With many thanks.
